title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4222.6 - Inspection of plating, bandaging
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4222.6 - Inspection of plating, bandaging

State Regulations
A representative of the association conducting a meeting
shall inspect the plating and bandaging of each horse as it enters the paddock
before the race and record the plating on a commission provided for the purpose
in the paddock. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4222.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
